title: Campus PD
overview: Depicting university life from the perspective of the professionals who police them, the groundbreaking series Campus PD presents real-life stories of law and disorderly conduct. As they gear up for a shift you never know what these cops might encounter. From dealing with rowdy partygoers to breaking up fights, policing a town full of fun-loving college kids is never easy. However, these officers keep their cool - even when no one else can.
